creator: Leslie.Ramer@peregrine.com
text:
I've been working on code that draws large numbers of java.awt.geom.Arc2D's; 
often filling them as pie slices and then drawing the same Arc again with an 
outline.  (I'd prefer to do both in one step, but I'd need to write a special 
paint handler and I'm too lazy).  Regardless,it would be nice if a shape/path 
gets reused that it be placed in the defs section and reUSEd; which could 
result in some significant space savings.  The problem is with mutable shapes 
like the Arc component; immutable shapes would be easy.  Just a suggestion.  
Thanks and keep up the good work.
